channel.title: Errors with scoreboard
channel.description:
I've been working on having my scoreboard say the top 10 players with the highest total stats.
I think i've got everything i need but i keep getting these stupid errors. It's probably something stupid but any help here would be awesome because for some reason this stumped me.
These are the errors I'm getting.
client.Java:12: Incompatible types found : Int required : int[] server.ranks = 0; ^
client.java:13: Incompatible types found : java.lang.String required : java.lang.String[] server.rankPpl = ""; ^
client.java:22: operator > cannot be applied to int[],int if(server.rans > 0> { ^
3 errors there

item.title: Errors with scoreboard
item.dc:creator: @str8_gb str8 gb
item.description:
@str8_gb wrote:

I’ve been working on having my scoreboard say the top 10 players with the highest total stats.

I think i’ve got everything i need but i keep getting these stupid errors. It’s probably something stupid but any help here would be awesome because for some reason this stumped me.

These are the errors I’m getting.

client.Java:12: Incompatible types
found : Int
required : int[]
server.ranks = 0;
^

client.java:13: Incompatible types
found : java.lang.String
required : java.lang.String[]
server.rankPpl = “”;
^

client.java:22: operator > cannot be applied to int[],int
if(server.rans > 0> {
^

3 errors there

Read full topic
